oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Leonidas & Buckner Smith
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Two young brothers from Pulaski, Tennessee. Dressed in black uniforms and holding hands with their arms around their shoulders. Leonidas is on the left and Buckner is on the right. Buckner was killed in the Battle of Perryville, Kentucky. Leonidas was wounded in the shoulder.
